name: Wargroove
description: Wargroove without steam requirement, launched directly against win. Game files are expected to be in a zip archive.
notes: --skip-intro because of "Halley has aborted..." Crash at Launch on Steam see https://community.playstarbound.com/threads/halley-has-aborted-crash-at-launch-on-steam.152133/ for information
content:
files:
- archive: N/A:Select source archive
game:
  arch: win64
  args: --skip-intro
  exe: data/win64_bin/wargroove64.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/data
    file: archive
wine:
  dxvk: true
